code:
# @name: state-simple-machine
# @type: state
# @format: mermaid
# @description: Simple state machine with transitions and error handling

stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Idle
    
    Idle --> Processing : start()
    Processing --> Running : execute()
    Running --> Processing : retry()
    Running --> Success : complete()
    Running --> Failed : error()
    
    Success --> [*]
    Failed --> Idle : reset()
    Failed --> [*] : abort()
    
    note right of Processing
        Preparing resources
        and validating input
    end note
    
    note right of Running
        Main processing loop
        with error handling
    end note
